reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown extremely sexy, comfortable, and well-made, appreciating its soft, smooth fabric that hugs curves seductively. The nightgown receives positive feedback for its quality and material, with one customer noting it's decent for photoshoots. Regarding size, while some customers find it perfect, others mention it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Lady Alert!!
items.body: Big Booty Ladiesssss! I absolutely love this lingerie set! It’s the perfect combination of sexy and elegant! The fabric feels incredibly soft against my skin, hugging every curve just right and making me feel both confident and irresistible. The lace details add a flirty touch, and the fit is very figure flattering it looks like it was custom-made for me. Every time I wear it, I feel empowered and gorgeous. Definitely my go-to set for a special evening! My Hubby loved me in it too! Why did you pick this product vs others?: I love the Avidlove Brand!!! Read more
items.author: T. Shaw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy thang
items.body: Fits great, great fabric, cheap came so fast! It is so sexy and comfortable. Read more

items.body: Perfect gift for wife Read more
items.author: Ronald R Bell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Avidlove lingerie is by far the best fit
items.body: I've bought many from Avidlove, and they fit pretty well. I carry most of my excess weight on my belly, 36DD, and am 5 ft, 150ish. Their large size works for me most of the time. Their prices are reasonable, and there are so many to choose from. Hand wash and air dry. The panties or g-strings that come with them never really fit, but I just pull the strings up further on my hips. This one does not have much support, but is cute anyway. The material is very soft. Read more
items.author: drkolie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: My Husband love love love this great quality Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and short
items.body: She liked it…. I ripped it off! Shame on me! Read more
items.author: Charles Chapman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is your sign to BUY IT!
items.body: This dress is 100% worth all the hype! I had been seeing it all over the place for weeks before I finally decided to buy it and I am so glad I did! I get lots of attention from my spouse every time I wear it! The material is soft and stretchy. Super comfortable on. Seems to hold up nicely with regular washing. There's not much in the way of chest support but, in my opinion, it really isn't necessary with this dress! Not a lot of coverage but that's kinda the point, right? It looks amazing on and just a little bit better on the floor. For anyone like me looking at reviews for size reference, I bought the XXL. It runs a little small so I recommend sizing up! Read more
items.author: Bunny

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Love Heart, A-leopard-coffee, Black, Heart Pink, Black02, Bow Print, Strawberry, Red Plaid, Royal Blue, Light Pink, Deep Purple, Grey, Lepoard-butterfly, Flower Love Heart. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
